newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai central bank to announce new measures Monday.
newsitem.headline: Thai central bank to announce new measures Monday.

text.p: Bank of Thailand deputy governor Chaiyawat Wibulswasdi said on Friday the central bank would call a press conference at 11.00 am (0400 GMT) on Monday to announce new monetary measures.
Chaiyawat declined to elaborate what measures the bank plans to announce.
Some analysts expect the new measures to be related to an abortive merger deal between major finance company Finance One Plc and medium-size Thai Danu Bank Plc.

Finance One and Thai Danu on Friday announced they decided to end two-month merger talks as the weak Thai economy and complicated legal and tax issues made their proposed alliance unfeasible and too time consuming.

Analysts said the government was concerned that the collapse of the Thai Danu-Finance One talks could shake public confidence in the stability of Thailand's 91 finance companies which are mostly heavily exposed to the troubled Thai property sector.
